operationId GetSiteDnsTargets

in path
required True

name siteid
description A site ID
in path
required True
schema

cdnGetSiteDnsTargetsResponse
type object
addresses

description The requested DNS CNAME targets

A sites hostname should point to these CNAME targets in order for traffic to be sent through StackPaths edge nodes
description The response from a request to retrieve a CDN sites DNS CNAME targets
